forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 49. North northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn approaches Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a tranquil sky painted with a gentle clarity. The overnight chill lingers, with temperatures resting around 49, promising to give way to a bright and sunny Tuesday. As the sun rises, it will bring warmth to the vibrant streets and stunning views, with a high of about 63. A soft north-northwest breeze will weave through the urban landscape, stirring the air just enough to keep the atmosphere fresh and invigorating.

The absence of fog is a delightful reprieve; the marine layer, typically a prominent feature of San Francisco mornings, seems to be holding back, allowing for expansive vistas of the Bay and the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge. This clear weather invites casual exploration—perhaps a leisurely walk through the picturesque streets of the Mission District, indulging in artisanal coffee and the rich aromas of freshly baked pastries. Dressed in layers to accommodate the day's fluctuations—perhaps starting with a cozy sweater and transitioning to a lighter jacket—the day promises both comfort and a sense of exploration, beckoning you to revel in the vibrant life of the city unfolding before you.
